attributes.action: Reduce single occupany council tax to 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment people who live alone pay 75% of the council tax bill. If two people live together, they pay 50% each. People living on their own do not use 50% more services than someone living with another adult at home. It is very unfair and should be reduced to 50%. With this policy, I am having to pay an extra £350 per year because of this unfair policy!

The govt can recoup the money by charging 75% on people's 2nd homes
